text:
MASX AI integrates several key data sources to power its geopolitical intelligence pipeline:
GDELT Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone for structured event data.
Google News RSS for real-time global news.
Google Search API for flashpoint detection.
Async HTTP fetching of over 10,000 multilingual news URLs per day.
Custom RSS/Atom feed parsing via FeedParser.

The system processes news in 50+ languages with automatic translation and entity extraction, forming the foundation for the MASX-Hotspots, MASX-GeoSignal, and MASX-Forecasting modules.
